```{r}
n <- nrow(prostate)
p <- ncol(prostate) - 1  # Subtracting 1 to exclude the response variable

print(paste("n =", n))
print(paste("p =", p))
```

```{r}
X <- model.matrix(~ lcavol + lweight + age + lbph + svi + lcp + gleason + pgg45, data = prostate)
print(head(X, 3))
```

```{r}
y <- prostate$lpsa
beta_hat <- solve(t(X) %*% X) %*% t(X) %*% y
print(beta_hat)
```

```{r}
model <- lm(lpsa ~ lcavol + lweight + age + lbph + svi + lcp + gleason + pgg45, data = prostate)
print(coef(model))
```

```{r}
y_hat <- X %*% beta_hat
SSE <- sum((y - y_hat)^2)
print(paste("Sum of squared vertical distances:", SSE))
```
